text: e number of patients (when available) Acute kidney injury - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Hypouricemia - Increased urinary urate - Uric acid nephrolithiasis - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
